mapper.select: select EC.ECID,ec.cid, c.cname,c.cycle,c.ADDRESS,c."TIME", ut.nick_name, t.tname, ec.works,ec.grade,ec.message from ELECTIVE_COURSE ec LEFT JOIN COURSE c on c.CID=EC.CID LEFT JOIN USERTABLE ut on ut.utid=c.tid LEFT JOIN TOPIC t on t.tid=ec.tid where EC.sid=#{utid} and ec.tid is null

select EC.ECID, c.cname,c.cycle,c.ADDRESS,c."TIME", ut.nick_name, t.tname, ec.works,ec.grade,ec.message from ELECTIVE_COURSE ec LEFT JOIN COURSE c on c.CID=EC.CID LEFT JOIN USERTABLE ut on ut.utid=c.tid LEFT JOIN TOPIC t on t.tid=ec.tid where EC.sid=#{utid} and ec.grade is not null

select EC.ECID, c.cid, c.cname,c.cycle,c.ADDRESS,c."TIME", ut.nick_name from ELECTIVE_COURSE ec LEFT JOIN COURSE c on c.CID=EC.CID LEFT JOIN USERTABLE ut on ut.utid=c.tid where ec.cid=${cid} and ec.sid=${utid}
mapper.update: update ELECTIVE_COURSE set tid=#{tid},works=#{works} where ecid=#{ecid} and sid=#{utid}
